# About

`EconFreedom` contains the economic freedom scores for countries and US states.

## Installation

```R
# install.package("devtools")
devtools::install_github("acforrester/EconFreedom")
```

## Datasets

### Economic Freedom of the World (EFW)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

EconFreedom::efwpnl %>% 
  filter(iso_code == "USA")

```


### Economic Freedom of North America (EFNA)

```{r}

library(tidyverse)

EconFreedom::efna %>% 
  filter(usps == "IL")

```
